1 SKY.name: 1 Sky
1 SKY.remarks: Near the Sunshine Square and Queensbay mall, Few mins drive to Penang Bridge and the Penang International Airport

118 @ Island Plaza.name: 118 @ ISLAND PLAZA
118 @ Island Plaza.remarks: Formerly Island Plaza office building. Bus stop, supermarket, shopping mall, restaurants and hawker center are within walking distance

BAYSWATER.name: BAYSWATER
BAYSWATER.remarks: Located next to Tesco and E-Gate Complex, only 3-mins drive to Penang Bridge

BELLISA COURT.name: BELLISA COURT
BELLISA COURT.remarks: Morning market, banks, post office, hawker center, Gurney Plaza and Gurney Paragon are within walking distance

BIRCH REGENCY @ PENANG TIMES SQUARE.name: BIRCH REGENCY @ PENANG TIMES SQUARE
BIRCH REGENCY @ PENANG TIMES SQUARE.remarks: Food court and McDonalds are right below the condominium

COASTAL TOWER.name: COASTAL TOWER
COASTAL TOWER.remarks: 10 ~15 mins drive to shopping center, restaurants, banks and Gurney area; some units can enjoy great sea view from balconies

COSTA VILLA.name: COSTA VILLA
COSTA VILLA.remarks: Located in a quiet neighborhood, Straits Quay, banks and hawker center are within walking distance

ELIT HEIGHTS.name: ELIT HEIGHTS
ELIT HEIGHTS.remarks: Retail outlets and restaurants are right below the condominium building. Only few mins drive to Penang international airport and Penang bridge

FETTES RESIDENCE.name: FETTES RESIDENCE
FETTES RESIDENCE.remarks: Bank, convenient shops, laundry, retail outlets, restaurants, hypermarket such as Tesco and Island Plaza are within walking distance

GURNEY BEACH RESORT CONDOMINIUM.name: GURNEY BEACH RESORT CONDOMINIUM
GURNEY BEACH RESORT CONDOMINIUM.remarks: Located along famous Gurney drive. Gurney Plaza, Gurney Paragon, caf√©s, restaurants and banks are within walking distance

GURNEY PARK CONDOMINIUM.name: GURNEY PARK CONDOMINIUM
GURNEY PARK CONDOMINIUM.remarks: Strategically located beside Gurney Plaza. Morning market, hawker center, banks and post office within walking distance

GURNEY VILLA.name: GURNEY VILLA
GURNEY VILLA.remarks: Located right next to Gurney Plaza. Morning market, post office, hospital and hawker center within walking distance

MANSION ONE.name: MANSION ONE
MANSION ONE.remarks: Gleneagles Hospital, food court, restaurants are within walking distance

MARINA BAY.name: MARINA BAY
MARINA BAY.remarks: Shopping center, restaurants, banks and bus stop within walking distance

MIAMI GREEN.name: MIAMI GREEN
MIAMI GREEN.remarks: A resort-styled condominium, 20-mins drive to Gurney area, Good seaview

MUTIARA VILLA CONDOMINIUM.name: MUTIARA VILLA CONDOMINIUM
MUTIARA VILLA CONDOMINIUM.remarks: 10 mins walk to Gurney Plaza and Gurney Paragon. One of the popular selection by foreigners

PERSIARAN GURNEY 1.name: PERSIARAN GURNEY 1
PERSIARAN GURNEY 1.remarks: Nice seaview, Hospital, food court and restaurants are within walking distance

PLATINO LUXURY CONDOMINIUM.name: PLATINO LUXURY CONDOMINIUM
PLATINO LUXURY CONDOMINIUM.remarks: 5-mins walk to Tesco, E-gate and Udini Square, 3-mins drive to Penang bridge

QUAYSIDE SEA FRONT RESORT CONDOMINIUM.name: QUAYSIDE SEA FRONT RESORT CONDOMINIUM
QUAYSIDE SEA FRONT RESORT CONDOMINIUM.remarks: Strategically located next to Strait Quay Marina Mall Tesco, restaurants and shopping centres within walking distance

Sri Pangkor Condominium.name: Sri Pangkor Condominium
Sri Pangkor Condominium.remarks: An exclusive condo with good facilities and amenities

SUMMERTON BAYAN INDAH.name: SUMMERTON BAYAN INDAH
SUMMERTON BAYAN INDAH.remarks: Located near Queensbay Mall, restaurants, banks, night market

TANJUNG PARK.name: TANJUNG PARK
TANJUNG PARK.remarks: 5-mins walk to shopping center, restaurants, banks, and bus stop

THE BREZZA.name: THE BREZZA
THE BREZZA.remarks: Straits Quay, Island Plaza and Tesco within walking distance, 5-mins drive to Gurney area
